update sell_order_ship
sell_order_id = #{sellOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ship_company_id = #{shipCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
issuance_date = #{issuanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ship_number = #{shipNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storage_method = #{storageMethod,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ship_tool_id = #{shipToolId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ship_method = #{shipMethod,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ship_address = #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ship_phone = #{shipPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_name =#{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_file_no = #{driverFileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ship_temper = #{shipTemper,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ship_quantity = #{shipQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sell_order_ship set sell_order_id = #{sellOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ship_company_id = #{shipCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ship_number = #{shipNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issuance_date = #{issuanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, storage_method = #{storageMethod,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ship_tool_id = #{shipToolId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ship_method = #{shipMethod,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ship_address = #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_phone = #{shipPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_name = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_file_no = #{driverFileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_temper = #{shipTemper,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ship_quantity = #{shipQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mileage = #{mileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ship_start_time = #{shipStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ship_end_time = #{shipEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select s.id as id, s.sell_order_id as sellOrderId, s.ship_company_id as shipCompanyId, s.issuance_date as issuanceDate, s.ship_number as shipNumber, s.storage_method as storageMethod, s.ship_tool_id as shipToolId, s.ship_method as shipMethod, s.ship_address as shipAddress, s.car_number as carNumber, s.ship_phone as shipPhone, s.driver_name as driverName, s.driver_file_no as driverFileNo, s.ship_temper as shipTemper, s.ship_quantity as shipQuantity, s.operator as operator, s.mileage as mileage, s.ship_start_time as shipStartTime, s.ship_end_time as shipEndTime, s.comment as comment, s.create_by as createBy, s.create_time as createTime, s.update_by as updateBy, s.update_time as updateTime, c.name as shipCompanyName, o1.value as shipToolName, o2.value as shipMethodName, o3.value as storageMethodName from sell_order_ship s left join ship_company c on s.ship_company_id = c.id left join options o3 on s.storage_method = o3.id left join options o1 on s.ship_tool_id = o1.id left join options o2 on s.ship_method = o2.id where s.sell_order_id = #{orderId}
